document_data.caption: Lady of Masks.
document_data.name: Sansuri
document_data.mainbody: Countess '''Sansuri''' was the ruler of the [[cloud giant]]s sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History:
Sansuri was one of the [[giant]] lords at the time of the shattering of the [[Ordning (social structure)|ordning]].

In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, after the disappearance of [[storm giant]] king [[Hekaton]], all giant lords started their path to reshaping the ordning. Sansuri's plan was to rediscover one of the ancient [[Ostoria]]n markets containing a long-lost trove of [[dragon]] magic.

In order to accomplish her project, Sansuri lured the [[bronze dragon]] [[Felgolos]] into her castle and imprisoned him in order to extract information. Though Felgolos knew nothing, Sansuri did not believe him and tortured him terribly.
document_data.Activities: Sansuri was always near Felgolos trying to extract information.
